chinese: 毕业的时候，她用书用力的扔向天空
english: when she graduated, she hurled her books into the air

chinese: 为了保证公平，这位年迈的百万富翁给每个儿子留下了一样多的钱
english: to ensure equity, the old millionaire left each son exactly the same amount

chinese: 这个过胖的男人正积极地通过锻炼来减肥
english: the obese man is actively trying to lose weight through exercise
he should be compensated for his work-related injury

chinese: 真正的朋友会永远在你身边
english: a genuine friend will always be by your side

chinese: 洗完澡后，浴室里的温度很高
english: the humidity in the bathroom is high after taking a bath

chinese: 我向我的秘书口述一款信件
english: i dictate a letter to my secretary

chinese: 裹在鸭子毛巾里的小婴儿笑得真开心
english: the infant in the duck towel is laughing happily

chinese: 植物和太阳构成了这个湖泊的生态系统
english: plants and the sun make up the ecosystem of this lake

chinese: 他简直是个傻子，竟然锯掉自己站着的那根树枝
english: he is such an idiot that he cuts the branch he stands on

chinese: 他的善良是我们大家的榜样，值得效仿
english: his kindness is an example to all of us, and worthy of emulation

chinese: 这家公司做了一项调查，去收集用户的意见
english: the company does a survey to collect user's opinions

chinese: 这个环卫工很伪善，他收集完垃圾后竟然朝海里倒
english: this environmental worker's hypocrisy even made him dump trash in the ocean after collecting it
